column5: Fishing has been really tough.  Back to the same difficult conditions as last week, with no bait or fish being marked.  Fished from 8am - 12pm.  We only got one fish but it was a DUKER.  A real beauty 27 pound mature king.  It took a 600 foot run on a wire Dipsy, 166 feet back on 3 setting, with a 11" ProChip with Cut Bait.        I am going to try and hit it hard tomorrow.
Holy smokes!! That's a MONSTER!  Great catch!  Congrats and Goodluck tomorrow!
That's a real monster king    Congrats vanillagorilla Sweet reward for your efforts!!! Thanks for sharing and keep up the good work! Leechman
Thats a real nice Salmon! whats the biggest in the derby so far?
Wow that is HUGE! I swear if you didn't say it was 27lb I would have assumed a lot more.
